channel.title: Comments on: Intranet Makeover: Virtual Web Sites with Custom DNS Names

item.title: By: ca8msm

item.description: I've just put in a change control to get all of our applications added like this! Thanks

item.title: By: riverguy
item.dc:creator: riverguy
item.description: Nice! This could come in very useful and I don't see who would not want to implement something like this if time and resources permit.
item.content:encoded: Nice! This could come in very useful and I don’t see who would not want to implement something like this if time and resources permit.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: This is pretty cool, I myself always used hostfiles especially for things that are behind firewalls and DMZs maybe inside a MCN and you can not even ping these boxes...add name and internal IP in hostfile and done
item.content:encoded: This is pretty cool, I myself always used hostfiles especially for things that are behind firewalls and DMZs maybe inside a MCN and you can not even ping these boxes…add name and internal IP in hostfile and done
